file.name: rich.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
paths:
    /rich/quote:
        post:
            summary: Create a rich-compatible HTML representation of a string for quoting.
            requestBody:
                content:
                    application/json:
                        schema:
                            properties:
                                body:
                                    description: Raw post text to render as a rich post quote.
                                    minLength: 1
                                    type: string
                                format:
                                    $ref: "schemas.yml#/components/schemas/Format"
                            required:
                                - body
                                - format
                            type: object
                required: true
            responses:
                "201":
                    content:
                        "application/json":
                            schema:
                                type: object
                                properties:
                                    quote:
                                        description: "A quoted representation of the text, rendered as HTML."
                                        minLength: 1
                                        type: string
                                required:
                                    - quote
                    description: Success
            tags:
                - Rich
components:
    schemas:

Error: parse: parse spec: parse operations: path "/rich/quote": post: requestBody: parse content: application/json: schema: parse schema: property "format": at 1:274: parse schema: resolve "schemas.yml#/components/schemas/Format": external "schemas.yml": get: file: local file reference is not allowed
